trans-unit.source: Represents the method that handles the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnknownAttribute>
When you create an XmlAttributeEventHandler delegate, you identify the method that handles the event.
trans-unit.target: 當您建立 XmlAttributeEventHandler 委派時，必須識別處理事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要將事件與事件處理常式產生關聯，將委派的執行個體加入事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時，會呼叫事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 事件和委派](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnknownAttribute> event occurs only when an object is being deserialized with the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.Deserialize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnknownAttribute>只有當物件要還原序列化的事件就會發生<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.Deserialize%2A>方法。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.Deserialize%2A> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnknownAttribute>
